newsitem.title: USA: Wynn's acquires plastic seals business.
newsitem.headline: Wynn's acquires plastic seals business.

text.p: Wynn's International Inc said Tuesday its unit Wynn's-Precision Inc has acquired substantially all of the assets of the automotive plastics business of Lawson Mardon Wheaton Inc.
Terms of the deal were not disclosed. Lawson Mardon Wheaton, located in Springfield, Kentucky, is a maker of plastic seals for automotive original equipment manufacturers.
Wynn's said the business has annual sales of about $14 million.
Shares of Wynn's were 7/8 higher at 29-1/8 in afternoon trading on the New York Stock Exchange.
